# Matthew Scott - Full Stack Developer Portfolio
https://projectlavos.com

## About
Matthew Scott is a full stack developer based in Louisville, KY. This portfolio showcases production applications and spec work for local businesses.

## Contact
- Email: matthewdscott7@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/guitargnarr
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/mscott77

## Production Applications
- FretVision (Guitar Learning): https://guitar.projectlavos.com
- PhishGuard (Security): https://phishguard.projectlavos.com
- Vantage (Job Market): https://jobs.projectlavos.com
- OurJourney (Personal): https://ourjourney.projectlavos.com
- JobTrack (Career): https://jobtrack.projectlavos.com

## Spec Work (Louisville Businesses)
20 demonstration websites built for real Louisville businesses. Full URL list available at:
https://projectlavos.com/portfolio-urls.json

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: FastAPI, Python, Node.js
- Deployment: Vercel, Render
- Database: PostgreSQL, Supabase
